articles.description: Follow match build-up, live text updates and radio from the Premier League featuring Crystal Palace v Liverpool.
articles.title: Premier League LIVE: Crystal Palace v Liverpool & seven other games - score, radio & text updates

articles.description: Bangladesh vs England LIVE: Women’s T20 World Cup at Sharjah Cricket Association Stadium, Sharjah – cricket score, radio commentary, video highlights and text updates
articles.title: Bangladesh vs England LIVE: Women’s T20 World Cup – cricket score, radio commentary, video highlights and text updates

articles.description: Mateo Kovacic scores twice as Manchester City overcome a dogged Fulham to pick up a first Premier League win in three games.
articles.title: Manchester City 3-2 Fulham: Mateo Kovacic scores twice as hosts win

articles.description: Liverpool boss Arne Slot fears he will be without goalkeeper Alisson "for a few weeks" following his injury against Crystal Palace.
articles.title: Alisson: Liverpool boss Arne Slot fears goalkeeper out for 'few weeks' with injury

articles.description: Bayer Leverkusen let a two-goal lead slip as newly-promoted Bundesliga side Holstein Kiel come from behind to earn a point.
articles.title: Bayer Leverkusen 2-2 Holstein Kiel: Alonso's 100th game ends in draw

articles.description: England captain Ben Stokes is out of the first Test against Pakistan after failing to recover from a hamstring injury in time.
articles.title: Pakistan v England: Ben Stokes out of first Test in Multan

articles.description: Brentford capitalise on a dreadful defensive performance from Wolves to claim their first top-flight victory since August and leave Gary O’Neil’s side still searching for their first Premier League win of the season.
articles.title: Brentford 5-3 Wolverhampton Wanderers: Brentford score four first-half goals to beat woeful Wolves

articles.description: Defending champions Australia comfortably beat Sri Lanka in their opening match of the Women's T20 World Cup in Sharjah.
articles.title: Women's T20 World Cup: Australia begin title defence with six-wicket win

articles.description: West Ham gain their first home Premier League win of the season as they overpower newly-promoted Ipswich Town, who remain without a victory since their top-flight return.
articles.title: West Ham United 4-1 Ipswich Town:  Hammers overpower visitors for first home Premier League win of season

articles.description: Scotland's hopes of retaining their WXV2 title are boosted by a hard-fought win over Japan in Cape Town.
articles.title: Scotland battle to WXV2 win over Japan
